name: Campagne
description:
Campagne is a city builder game made for GBJAM6 :)

Let me introduce the team :

  • A_Do : pixel art
  • Le Art : Chiptunes
  • Mirionos : Game Design, Code
  • yopox : Code

We used LibGDX and Kotlin, the game is available under the CC0-1.0 license on GitHub.

Controls :

  • A button -> O / SPACE
  • B button -> K / ESC
  • D-Pad -> WASD / ZQSD / Arrows
  • Start -> B / ENTER
  • Select -> V / TAB
  • Change the palette -> P 

Please try the tutorial to understand the basics of the game. If you want to learn more about the game design, you can look here :)

PS: Thanks Phaell for correcting the texts !
